```{r}
library(R2jags)

# (prepare bdat as in earlier steps: minDB, N, ID, n_t, X, outer, outer_wt)

# quick list of parameters to monitor
params <- c("gamma0","gamma1","gamma2","sigma2","mu_a","mu_d","mu_eta","A_mean","B_mean")

# run a very short test (small iter) just to verify the model compiles & initializes
jags_test <- jags(data = bdat,
                  inits = fun.inits,
                  parameters.to.save = params,
                  model.file = "mtModel.jags",
                  n.chains = 2,
                  n.iter = 2000,
                  n.burnin = 500,
                  n.thin = 1,
                  DIC = FALSE,
                  progress.bar = "text")

print(jags_test)

```
